lines.text: What kind of woman would beat her plastic doll?
You're not my doctor!
No.
Who are you?
Me?
[unrolls piece of tape]
I'm the tape man.
Ah, the way!
Damn, I missed her. What'd she look like?
What'd she look like? She looked like a broad.
What d'you mean? She's fat?
Naw, she's not - not that kind of broad. The other kind. She's a broad, she's a woman.
You mean like a dame?
Well, yeah, like a dame. I guess you could say a dame.
How about like a chick?
No, she didn't look like a chick. She looked more like a broad. That's why I said a broad.
Oh yeah, that helps me. You're very observant.
Are you serious?
You didn't miss... You hit everything!
You know, you and I are a lot alike. Friedrich would be proud.
Friedrich wouldn't give a damn, Rosellini.
[both pull out and cock their guns]
Seems mine is bigger than yours.
Size doesn't matter.
Oh, yes it does.
You mean those girls have been lying to me all those years?
Who the fuck is this girl, Bruce Lee?
Nah, she's better than that. Chuck Norris.
What are you talking about?
He's alive.

[shouts while hitting Tony with a newspaper in the head and chest]
One to the head, one to the heart. One to the head, one to the heart. What did I teach you?
Doctors wanna lock *me* up.
You got me walking around a parking lot squirting at people!
[ah what is life, if not to dance]
[Zorba the Greek]
